full_summary:
### Lanyard Tender Announcement
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01021029
**Solicitation Number:** 202303497
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Publication Date:** 2023-01-12
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-24T14:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a supplier to provide Lanyard. The solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Feature and Requirements:**
The requirement includes:
- A firm quantity of 6,000 Lanyard, compliant to RCMP Specification G.S. 1045-050, dated 2022-10-12.
- Three (3) options of 1500 Lanyard, exercisable within twelve (12), twenty-four (24) and thirty-six (36) months of contract award, respectively.

**Procurement Documents:**
Refer to the attached document for further information and the specifications. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Procuring Office: Carla Schonauer, Procurement Officer, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2.

**Notice of Invitation to Tender:**
The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime, administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. The integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.

**Submission and Clarification of Questions:**
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Canada is not responsible and will not assume any liabilities for the information found on websites of third parties. It is the sole responsibility of the Bidder to regularly consult GETS (Canada's Electronic Tendering Service) for the most up-to-date information.

**Attachment:**
Available documents in English/French attached, referenced below.
- Lanyard RFP (Principal Contract)
- Lanyard RFP, Amendment 001 (Lanyard Specification)
- Lanyard RFP, Amendment 002 (Whipping Knot)
- Lanyard RFP, Amendment 003 (Sliding Keeper Knot)
- 050 Lanyard 2022-10-12 Specification (English/French)
- Contract Description (English/French)

**Recipient and Contact:**
Royal Canadian Mounted Police, Carla Schonauer, Procurement Officer
